title: Gabriela Beltramino - Senses
description:
This is Gabriela's first studio album.
"Senses" is a conceptual album in which the artist's intention is to remember through songs twelve unforgettable moments of her own lifetime. Starting by her childhood and finishing in the way she looks at life today, "Senses" is a different approach to jazz standards and the American songbook, with the aim of reaching emotions and those feelings that hide in the depth of every soul.
credits
released January 18, 2015
